OGC Web Coverage Service 1.1.1 - Executable Test Suite 1.18 API

WCS 1.1.1 Conformance Test Suite

Verifies that Web Coverage Service (WCS) implementation is based on the following OGC specifications:

  • OGC Web Coverage Service (WCS) Implementation Specification Corrigendum 1 (1.1.1 c1) [OGC 07-067r2]

The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The Obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional).

Test run arguments
Name Value domain Obligation Description
url URI M An absolute URI that refers to an XML representation of the service capabilities document. This document does not need to be obtained from the service under test (SUT), but it must describe the implementation under test (IUT). Ampersand ('&') characters appearing within a query parameter value must be percent-encoded as %26.

Package
Description
org.opengis.cite.wcs11
